title: How should I report of someone cs ur minions on purpose? (sup most likely)
body: I'm a gold ranking player, love adc and top. But there r always some sup they took the cs from the adc on purpose (not sure)  especially when i ask them do not take my cs, and they took even more. its it really fun to make other people angry? and im very sure that belongs to destroy other peoples game experience. cuz im really angry the behavior like this. Second thing is how riot will punish someone who do not like their role during the champion pool picking and took others lane on purpose? for  example when i am top, there are always some player chat:" i go top" and then just pick a top champion when his lane is not top lane. same for other lane. how did riot punish for player like this? because this is 100% belongs to ruin others game experience. if i took ur lane without ur permission would u be happy?? next time i will do these too if riot not gonna do something about these two behavior, because I can't even report them for that when the game is over. so riot tell me why should i be a good player and play the game so painful when other bad player doing these stuff and u don't give a damn?

replies.body: You can't report for that since it's not "your" CS. It's the teams. Plus there are things like Relic Shield that would make reporting idiotic since the point of that items (and it's upgrades) is to take CS!

> [{quoted}](name=Sarutobi,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=h2xuVxhf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-09-15T06:36:25.701+0000)
>
> You can't report for that since it's not "your" CS. It's the teams. Plus there are things like Relic Shield that would make reporting idiotic since the point of that items (and it's upgrades) is to take CS!

If it's the laning phase, the kane CS is his as long as support doesn't habe relic shield ready. If laning phase is over then it's teams. If it were "team's" CS during the laning phase, then how about you go 5 bot lane(incliding jungler) and take all the cs during the laning phase.
Then see how much of a point if you've just made.
If a sup takes a non relic shield item or a doran's ring(looking at you Lux and Brand mains), and taking CS during the laning phase, you are officially trolling.
The end.

That's not how it works. There is no ownership of CS. Ever.

The end.

> [{quoted}](name=Chermorg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=h2xuVxhf,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-09-15T17:41:24.592+0000)
>
> That's not how it works. There is no ownership of CS. Ever.
> 
> The end.

Alright. Continue being ignorrant and go 5 bot lane then. See how far you'll go like that.
"You disagree with my objectively one true subjective opinion. That means you're ignorant."

I love how most people are saying 'it's not your cs' but this happened to them they would probably flip their shit.

There are situations where support *should* take cs, like if tower is in danger, if adc isn't in lane, of they have a relic stack, etc. But other than that it's more or less griefing. And that's coming from a support main. Just my 2 cents.

> [{quoted}](name=Bijeesny,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=h2xuVxhf,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-09-15T12:26:22.296+0000)
>
> I love how most people are saying 'it's not your cs' but this happened to them they would probably flip their shit.
> 
> There are situations where support *should* take cs, like if tower is in danger, if adc isn't in lane, of they have a relic stack, etc. But other than that it's more or less griefing. And that's coming from a support main. Just my 2 cents.

OP asked about how they can report them this is why most people are saying 'it's not your cs' Because taking the minions isn't a reportable offense even if its the support taking it from the adc however most players understand that on average giving the adc player the farm is best for the team as a whole.

Still not reportable though.

> [{quoted}](name=CheapKill,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=h2xuVxhf,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2018-09-15T12:32:36.121+0000)
>
> OP asked about how they can report them this is why most people are saying &#x27;it&#x27;s not your cs&#x27; Because taking the minions isn't a reportable offense even if its the support taking it from the adc however most players understand that on average giving the adc player the farm is best for the team as a whole.
> 

Because OP said supp took his farm on purpose. I will take a wild guess and assume that his supp actively tried to farm creeps while adc was in the lane. Otherwise OP is in the wrong. And it's not reportable offense even if your support sabotages you in the process of taking you farm, even after asking him to stop it? Last time I checked, intentionally sabotaging your laner is a reportable offense.

And what's the point of supp taking farm anyway? For getting support items faster? Who would you support then? An underfarmed adc? And giving farm to your adc is ALWAYS the best for the team because he's the DAMAGE DEALER. Starving your damage dealer from the farm doesn't help any1. If you think it's a good thing, then by all means go and do that in your ranked game, and tells us how those games went.


> Still not reportable though.

If it was a necessary thing to do then sure it's not.

> [{quoted}](name=Bijeesny,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=h2xuVxhf,comment-id=000600000001,timestamp=2018-09-15T12:49:05.344+0000)
>
> Because OP said supp took his farm on purpose. I will take a wild guess and assume that his supp actively tried to farm creeps while adc was in the lane. Otherwise OP is in the wrong. And it's not reportable offense even if your support sabotages you in the process of taking you farm, even after asking him to stop it? Last time I checked, intentionally sabotaging your laner is a reportable offense.
> 
> And what's the point of supp taking farm anyway? For getting support items faster? Who would you support then? An underfarmed adc? And giving farm to your adc is ALWAYS the best for the team because he's the DAMAGE DEALER. Starving your damage dealer from the farm doesn't help any1. If you think it's a good thing, then by all means go and do that in your ranked game, and tells us how those games went.
> 
> If it was a necessary thing to do then sure it's not.

Still not reportable though.

> [{quoted}](name=CheapKill,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=h2xuVxhf,comment-id=0006000000010000,timestamp=2018-09-15T12:50:29.366+0000)
>
> Still not reportable though.

Then go and do that. Actively fight with your own adc for farm, and then tell him you are allowed to do that cuz it's not reportable. I'm really curious how would adc players in your elo react to that.
likely react in a way that gets HIM punishable? Still won't make it punishable for the support.

> [{quoted}](name=zPOOPz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=h2xuVxhf,comment-id=000600000001000000000001,timestamp=2018-09-15T18:40:08.998+0000)
>
> likely react in a way that gets HIM punishable? Still won't make it punishable for the support.

So what you're saying is that I'm fully allowed to take my adc's CS even if it sets him behind, even if he told me not to do it, and potentially get him banned?
....I mean, I have no words, basically this is approved ban baiting method.

Since the bottom lane player (formerly known as adc) does not "own" any of the minions creeps,

> So what you're saying is that I'm fully allowed to take my adc's CS even if it sets him behind, even if he told me not to do it

Yes, you are allowed to take the team's cs.  It is not "adc's cs".  He has no more rights to "told" you not to do it and you have to listen than you have any right to tell him what to do.

> and potentially get him banned?

That depends on how he "reacts".

> basically this is approved ban baiting method.

How is it a ban baiting method?  With the premise that minion creeps belongs to the team and not any particular person, people should not overreact to begin with.

> [{quoted}](name=zPOOPz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=h2xuVxhf,comment-id=00060000000100000000000100000000,timestamp=2018-09-16T09:30:18.538+0000)
>
> Since the bottom lane player (formerly known as adc) does not "own" any of the minions creeps,
> 
> Yes, you are allowed to take the team's cs.  It is not "adc's cs".  He has no more rights to "told" you not to do it and you have to listen than you have any right to tell him what to do.
> 
> That depends on how he "reacts".
> 
> How is it a ban baiting method?  With the premise that minion creeps belongs to the team and not any particular person, people should not overreact to begin with.

How is it a baiting method? Simple. You take farm from your adc. He gets mad at you. You provoke him with that to the point where he hardcore flames you. You report him. If he said 0-tol phrases he gets 2 week banned and you walk away and do the same thing in next games.

And about cs not belonging to any1...explain that to many players who followed the 'bolane cs is for adc' mentality since the early days of League. You can't.

And since you're so ready to defend that behaviour, then explain to me, and other Boards users, how would you play as an adc who got starved from farming by his support? 
What would you build? 
Would you stay on bot lane?
How would you get gold for your items?

This is Player Behavior Board, not Gameplay.  I understand the game mechanics and gold distribution and all that.  I'm only interested in discussing policy.  That's why I'm in PB board and not Gameplay....

> How is it a baiting method? Simple. You take farm from your adc. He gets mad at you. You provoke him with that to the point where he hardcore flames you. You report him. If he said 0-tol phrases he gets 2 week banned and you walk away and do the same thing in next games.
> 
> And about cs not belonging to any1...explain that to many players who followed the 'bolane cs is for adc' mentality since the early days of League. You can't.

You cannot "take from" anything that the adc does not own.  Many players also followed the "more reports = more punishment" mentality too, but that doesn't mean they won't be punished for spamming "report xxx" to harass another player.  Ignorance is not an excuse.  The policy is cs belong to the team, not any particular person.  You can be ignorance about it and get pissy about it and get punished for hardcore flame, but that's on you at the end of the day.

And to be clear.  I am not defending any behavior (especially taking cs as support, and again, PB, not Gameplay).  I'm only interested in discussing what is and is not policy.

> [{quoted}](name=Bijeesny,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=h2xuVxhf,comment-id=00060000000100000000,timestamp=2018-09-15T13:00:34.284+0000)
>
> Then go and do that. Actively fight with your own adc for farm, and then tell him you are allowed to do that cuz it's not reportable. I'm really curious how would adc players in your elo react to that.

Still not reportable though.

>

you could argue that the support might be doing it on purposed to deny the carry gold so they loose the game because of the item difference.
I would say, that if you have the feeling that this might be the case, you can report it as griefing given that excact explanation.
Wether it is the case or not has to be decided by watching the game.
I have had my share of autofills literally running down mid before to end the game quicker, so I would not be suprised to find this kind of "soft griefing".

There is no official rule from Riot of Gold distribution,
you can't ban someone for doing something that you don't like/benefit from.

A jungler can come down and take all your cs, and you can take all his jungle.
there is no official rule, just like when i don't leash as top, or if im doing a level 1 ambush.
they can come in and take some gold, I only get mad if they are doing it to piss me off.

unless your support is taking the gold for the sole purpose of trolling, they want some gold.
you are never, the sole carry of the game.
this is a team game.

With the meta shifting into hyperdrive, ADCs just either have insane base damage, or just scale with items like a god.
And you are the reason auto fill exists. With adcs like you, no one wants to be support. I can’t even think about the times I got flamed for using relic shield.

> [{quoted}](name=5Percenter,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=h2xuVxhf,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-09-15T07:12:30.578+0000)

People like this ruin the game, actu g like every minion is scared esp in low elo. It makes a difference sure, and yes there are supp who CS sometimes which sucks. But you gotta learn how to deal with it. AdC mains are often snowflakes and freak out.

I hope English isnt your first language

> actu g like every minion is scared 

Of course they're scared, their sole purpose is to run in and die. I'd be scared of that too.

Maybe you meant **sacred**, Mr "I hope English isn't your first language"?
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> [{quoted}](name=Negativity ll,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=h2xuVxhf,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2018-09-15T12:40:27.548+0000)

Damn straight. But this shit ain’t no resume or english paper, just another internent forum full of know it alls, crybabies and grammer police.

well i am sure im nothing to do with auto fill , and all i want it is not taking my cs when u as a sup, seems like i ask too much ? im not sure who blamed u for using relic shield but 100% thats not me and im very cool with whatever items u buy and use. :)

It's really not your cs. It's offered to you as you are the carry and you getting gold to build damage in turn benefits the team.
As a support main I can and **will** take cs from time to time, **if** I'm confident you aren't going to land the last hit. I am even more inclined to deliberately take cs if "gentlemen" such as yourself start giving me a hard time for taking a minion here and there. Those demands demonstrate a lack of trust and respect for your supporting laner.

this is the first time that i heard someone taking cs with such beautiful reason and excuse.  if what u thinking is right, jg can go to top mid bot lane taking all the cs and said to the team i will turn benefits to the team. do u think that will work? i can also taking all the jg monster from the start and tell the team i will turn benefits to the team pls trust me. i don't think anyone will like my excuse which is ur excuse. the game is not just about winning, winning is important for sure.but also just like no matter how good you are u still can't toxic to others. its also is about respectful and give teammates good game feeling. what u doing, taking cs as a sup , 100% adc will be very angry just like me. i will not feel good even the game is winning. and if you are really that good as you say you are, ( your answer making me feel u r good skill player) u can just pick top jg mid lane as a carrier. why you pick sup and take cs and thinking about carry the game? if u meet me in game and u do that, im telling u right now i will do everything i can to make the game lose and without me get banned. because there is no way after u destroy my game experience and i still help u win the game, doesn't work like that , respect is mutual right?:)

A good team has respect and understanding. You clearly don't.

intentional feeding/trolling it's one of the options

Despite everyone talking about "It is not you cs"-blablabla, 
You could report it for "grieving" with the argument that the suuport player is effectifly trying to hinder the Carry from getting gold to get items.
Because in the end. Having the will to win is not an optional thing for this game and a player tha effectivly sabotages the carries might be trying to loose.

Now, of course, someone would have to actually watch the game to see, wether the support was actually denying you gold or wether they are just aking the cs you might have missed.

you cant report for this kind of stuff but you can go afk 
thats why you need a smurf accounts
